name: Rusty Tank Survival
description: Rusty Tank Survival is a 2-D top down massive online multiplayer survival game where you start out as a rusty old tank. The game is open world sandbox game that includes base building, factory building, and player versus player and player versus server (PVP+S) elements. Rusty Tank has been built from the ground up to be a massively online multiplayer game, with early game development focusing on performance optimization and anti-cheat.
